translations: n.门徒的身分，做门徒的时期

phrs.translation: 门徒训练, 做弟子的身份, 追随基督, 门徒小组
做门徒的代价, 门徒的代价

sentences.translation: 这是自恋，不是主的门徒。

sentences.sentence: The Master demanded seriousness of purpose from those who sought discipleship.
sentences.translation: 大师要求拜师的人目的严肃。

sentences.sentence: So far we have seen that this journey involves believing (through worship), belonging (through fellowship), and becoming (through discipleship).
sentences.translation: 到目前为止，这个旅程包括相信(透过敬拜)、归属(透过团契相交)和改变(透过门徒训练)。
